title: Why can I not select 3 or 4 roles in dynamic queue?
body:
So I began playing League in Season 2 and I have said for the majority of my ranked play "Fill except support" so why can I not queue for Mid, Top, Jungle and ADC, ultimately shortening my queue times and I am literally happy to play any of those roles, I have to spend longer in queues because Riot half assed their system.

Btw I'm on Oce where the queue times on my high Gold smurf are 5 - 10 minutes every single game.

What possibly reason could there be for not letting me queue for four roles instead of just two, or fill (support). It just seems like Riot couldn't be fked, simple as that. It would shorten queue times in all elos in all servers, and if you only want to queue for two and tank the queue time you can, but why not allow people who are happy to play 3 or 4 roles specifically pick 3 or 4 roles, it's just logical...
